DOC.brief_summary: Arterial pulse wave velocity ( PWV ) strongly correlate atherosclerosis , PWV carotid femoral artery could predict severity arterial atherosclerosis . Because measurement PWV noninvasive , would serve good clinical screen marker evaluate extent atherosclerosis . The study use self-made PWV measurement device investigate correlation PWV high cardiovascular risk population , compare normal population .
DOC.brief_title: Association Between Peripheral Artery Stiffness Cardiovascular Disease
